changelog:
JSON UPDATE REQUIRED FOR CORRECT SGAIL/HANTU ALERTED BRICK
- Sapienza: The Icon – Removes Dino Bosco from showdowns to prevent suspects being killed by his robot, sets dead logic, tweaks some NPCs
- Sapienza: Sunset ETs – Removes delivery and cyclist guys, fixes car changing during exit sequence, Adds 5x hard mode NPCs as targets
- Sapienza: Night Meth Lab – Also removes delivery and cyclist guys
- Romania: Fixes unscannable safe clue under chair
- Paris: Day – A possible target starts his route instead of leaning on a balcony forever until you’re close, all NPC changes that apply to territory takedown now apply to showdown
- Chongqing: Noodle Massacre - Adds latest Accent Overhaul files, including Bruce Lee voice
- Sgail/Hantu: Re-instates Alerted brick. Should no longer have 'Camera Destroyed' when not alerted on Hantu/Sgail. Slight chance you'll see some floating cameras in Hantu in Alerted
- SMF3 Beta: Should no longer cause crash on Hantu Port, removes ALL warnings by re-deploy
